mapper.select: SELECT context_id , block_id , context_type , context_name , created_date , last_update_date , creator , last_updater FROM BUILDER_V1_BLOCK_CONTEXT WHERE context_id = #{contextId, typeHandler=com.ebson.skillserver.typeHandler.UUIDTypeHandler}
SELECT context_id , block_id , context_type , context_name , created_date , last_update_date , creator , last_updater FROM BUILDER_V1_BLOCK_CONTEXT
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BUILDER_V1_BLOCK_CONTEXT WHERE context_id = #{contextId, jdbcType=BINARY, typeHandler=com.ebson.skillserver.typeHandler.UUIDTypeHandler}
